sentence.Network_en: So , with great perseverance and untiring industry, he prospered.

entry.def: If you describe a person or their efforts as untiring, you approve of them because they continue what they are doing without slowing down or stopping.

example.ex: ...an untiring fighter for justice, democracy and tolerance.
example.tran: 为公正、民主和宽容奋斗不息的斗士

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by hard work and perseverance

auth_sentence.content: Ida was an untiring and conscientious worker.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ida was an untiring and conscientious worker.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ida was an untiring and conscientious worker.

Sentence.sentence: His untiring effort to fulfill his potential.
